question: 幼年時代
sourceMnemonic: You have <ja>時代</ja> as a "period" of time you're talking about. What period? The <kanji>infancy</kanji> <kanji>year</kanji>s. Those years are not just when you're a baby, but when you were growing up, too. That was your <vocabulary>childhood</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
